snippet: The evidence of bias against Jewish students in Emory University’s dental school has long been known, but until now the university had neither admitted the bias nor apologized for it.
abstract: Evidence of bias against Jewish students at Emory University’s dental school from 1948 to 1961 has long been known, but until now the university had neither admitted the bias nor apologized for it; school invites many Jewish former students to private meeting with its president and will host premiere of documentary film about the scandal.
lead_paragraph: The evidence of bias against Jewish students in Emory University’s dental school has long been known, but until now the university had neither admitted the bias nor apologized for it.

headline.seo: Emory Confronts Legacy of Bias Against Jews in Dental School
headline.main: Emory Confronts a Legacy of Bias Against Jews
headline.print_headline: Emory Confronts a Legacy of Bias Against Jews
